channel.title: Comments on: Mission of Burma reissue campaign, tour dates

item.title: By: Kevin Langston
item.dc:creator: Kevin Langston
item.description: Matador's Pavement reissues have been incredible. I hope these are just as well done.
item.content:encoded: Matador’s Pavement reissues have been incredible. I hope these are just as well done.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i saw them at the echo lounge in february of 2002. it was incredible. and also extremely loud.
item.content:encoded: i saw them at the echo lounge in february of 2002. it was incredible. and also extremely loud.

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: Where did you see them? I saw them at the Earl in Atlanta earlier this year. Great show, but very, very loud.
item.content:encoded: Where did you see them? I saw them at the Earl in Atlanta earlier this year. Great show, but very, very loud.
